text: ye Qurâ€™an ki ayate hai aur jo kuch aap ki taraf aap ke rub ki jaanib se utara jata hai sub haq hai lekin aksar log imaan nahi laate, Allah wo hai jis ne aasmaano ko baghair sutuno ke buland kar rakha hai, ke tum ose dekh rahe ho phir wo arsh par qaraar pakde hoye hai, osi ne suraj aur chaand ko ma-tehti mein laga rakha hai, har ek miyaad muayyan par gasht kar raha hai, wahi kaam ki tadbeer karta hai, wo apne nashanaath khol khol kar bayaan kar raha hai ke tum apne rub ki mulaqaath ka yaqeen karlo
